description: This file defines a Java class 'JobDescription' that represents a parsed entity of a job posting, including fields for skills, keywords, title, and timestamps, and is mapped to a MongoDB collection.

classes.name: JobDescription
classes.description: Entity class for storing parsed job description data, including text, skills, keywords, and metadata, mapped to a MongoDB collection.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the unique identifier for the job description.

methods.name: getUserId
methods.description: Returns the user ID who uploaded the job description.

methods.name: getFullText
methods.description: Returns the full text of the job description.

methods.name: getSkills
methods.description: Returns the list of skills associated with the job description.

methods.name: getKeywords
methods.description: Returns the list of keywords associated with the job description.

methods.name: getTitle
methods.description: Returns the title of the job description.

methods.name: getCreatedAt
methods.description: Returns the timestamp when the job description was created.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the unique identifier for this job description.

methods.name: setUserId
methods.description: Sets the user ID who uploaded the job description.

methods.name: setFullText
methods.description: Sets the full text of the job description.

methods.name: setTitle
methods.description: Sets the title of the job description.
